# Data

```{r}
# Import data
russia_losses_equipment <- read_csv("russia_losses_equipment.csv")
russia_losses_personnel <- read_csv("russia_losses_personnel.csv")
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
# Change data to long format
russia_losses_equipment_long <- melt(russia_losses_equipment, id = "date")

head(russia_losses_equipment_long)
```

# Losses by Russia
## Equipment
```{r}
russia_losses_equipment_long %>% 
  filter(variable == "aircraft" | variable == "helicopter" | variable == "tank" | variable == "APC" | variable == "field artillery" | variable == "drone") %>% 
  ggplot() +
  aes(date, value, colour = variable) +
  geom_line(size = 0.3) +
  geom_point(size = 0.5) +
  facet_wrap(~variable, scales = "free_y") +
  labs(x = NULL, y = NULL, title = "Russian Equipment Lost", caption = "Source: Armed Forces of Ukraine, Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. Graphic: @wyuet") +
  theme_bw() +
  theme(legend.position = "none")

```

## Personnel
```{r}

russia_losses_personnel %>% 
  gg_line(x_var = date,
          y_var = personnel,
          x_title = "",
          y_title = "",
          title = "Russian Personnel Lost",
          caption = "Source: Armed Forces of Ukraine, Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. Graphic: @wyuet",
          theme = theme_bw())
```
